dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4989 IH: Healthy Babies Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. De La Cruz (for herself and Mr. Moylan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to allow infant food combinations and dinners under the special supplemental nutrition program for women, infants, and children, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Healthy Babies Act of 2023.

section.header: Infant food combinations and dinners under WIC
section.text: Section 17 of the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 (42 U.S.C. 1786) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: Not later than 1 year after the date of the enactment of this subsection, the Secretary shall update the regulations prescribed pursuant to subsection (f)(11)(A) to amend the supplemental foods available to include infant food combinations and dinners.
